Instruction: In a mixing bowl, whisk together flour, cornmeal, baking powder, salt, and pepper. In a separate bowl, mix together eggs, milk, and melted butter until well combined. Add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients and stir until just blended.
Whisk together eggs, egg whites, and milk in a glass bowl until well blended.
Reheat the egg mixture in the microwave until it's warmed, approximately 1 minute.
Mix flour into the egg mixture until it is fully blended into a batter.
Pour the batter evenly into the hot muffin cups, filling each one about two-thirds full.
Bake in the preheated oven until puffed and golden brown, about 15 minutes.
Allow to cool slightly before serving.
Ensure that your batter is warm and your oil is hot.
